 Add-ons and integrations 
You can extend the functionality of IBM® Cloud Pak for Data through add-ons and
by integrating Cloud Pak for Data with other applications.  
 Add-ons 
Add-ons are services that are deployed in your Cloud Pak for Data cluster. For more
information about the add-ons that are available for Cloud Pak for Data, see Add-
ons 
 Integrations 
Integrations are connections to applications that run outside of your Cloud Pak for
Data cluster. For more information about the applications that you can integrate
with, see Integrations. 
 
Add-ons 
 The IBM Cloud Pak for Data web client includes a catalog of add-ons that you can
use to extend the functionality of Cloud Pak for Data.
Integrations 
 Integrations are connections to applications that run outside of your IBM Cloud
Pak for Data cluster. 
3
1.
2.
3.

 Add-ons 
The IBM® Cloud Pak for Data web client includes a catalog of add-ons that you can
use to extend the functionality of Cloud Pak for Data. 
 Accessing the list of add-ons 
To access the list of add-ons that you can install on top of Cloud Pak for Data: 
From the toolbar, click the Add-ons icon ( ).
Click the add-on you want to learn more about.
If you're ready to use the add-on to extend your Cloud Pak for Data environment,
click Get started.
Some add-ons are provided free of charge, while other add-ons are priced. 
Currently, the catalog includes the following types of add-ons:
AI
Analytics
Dashboards
Data governance
Data sources
Developer tools
Industry accelerators
Storage
